All rights reserved. @@ -55,1 +55,1 @@ -abstract public class DebugeeProcess extends FinalizableObject { +abstract public class DebugeeProcess { @@ -87,3 +87,0 @@ - - // Register the cleanup() method to be called when this instance becomes unreachable. - registerCleanup(); @@ -433,1 +430,1 @@ - * @throws Throwable if any throwable exception is thrown during finalization + * @throws Throwable if any throwable exception is thrown during shutdown @@ -461,8 +458,0 @@ - /** - * Finalize debuggee VM wrapper by invoking close(). - * - * @throws Throwable if any throwable exception is thrown during finalization - */ - public void cleanup() { - close(); - }
